title: Authme怎么把提示拥有账户的信息去掉?
author: 布鲁鲁

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
# Should we display all other accounts from a player when he joins?
        # permission: /authme.admin.accounts
        displayOtherAccounts: true


plugins\authme\config.yml   改成false即可

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:

可以改config的把true改为false即可
